author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of the Tamil Nadu Government College Teachers’ Association on Tuesday staged a demonstration in front of the Joint Director of Collegiate Education, demanding the State government to fill vacancies in government and aided colleges.

T. Arivudainambi, State vice-president, presided over the agitation. A large number of college teachers from different parts of Tiruchi zone took part in it. Rectifying pay anomalies, filling Vice-Chancellor vacancies and UGC scale of pay for all lecturers of university constituent colleges were their prominent demands.
title: College teachers stage demonstratoin
